title: Kensa Undercover Brella
paragraphs: The Kensa Undercover Brella is a main weapon in Splatoon 2. It is a Toni Kensa-branded variant of the Undercover Brella.

The Kensa Undercover Brella shares its overall design with the Undercover Brella. However, the Kensa Undercover Brella has a black handle and a white shield. The Toni Kensa signature red clothespin is attached to the muzzle.
The Kensa Undercover Brella was released on 7 November 2018 at 02:00 UTC.[1] It comes with Torpedoes and Ink Armor.
- An Octoling girl (second to the left) with the Kensa Undercover Brella.
